title:

Introducing the LK 2 Pack for Google Pixel 8 Screen Protector with 2 Pack Camera Lens Protector! 

This screen protector and camera lens protector combo is specifically designed for the Google Pixel 8, ensuring a perfect fit and maximum protection for your device. 

With this package, you will receive 2x Tempered Glass Screen Protectors and 2x Camera Lens Protectors, along with all the necessary installation accessories for a hassle-free application. 

The screen protector features 9H Hardness Tempered Glass, providing superior protection against scratches, drops, and impacts. Its HD Ultra-thin design preserves the original visual quality of your device and is fingerprint compatible. The military-grade shatterproof feature ensures that your screen remains intact even under extreme conditions. The edge strengthening design offers added durability, while the high-response haptic touch allows for smooth and responsive touchscreen interactions. 

The camera lens protector is also made of 9H Hardness Tempered Glass, providing scratch resistance and shatterproof protection for your camera lens. 

With this LK screen protector and camera lens protector combo, you can enjoy a high-definition visual experience with the original quality of your Google Pixel 8 maintained. 

In addition, we offer lifetime service with 24-hour customer support, ensuring that you are always taken care of.
